meta.title: Setup Infrastructure with PostgreSQL and Redis/Valkey

task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 1 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Provision PostgreSQL database using CloudNative-PG operator and Redis/Valkey cache to support the notification service
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create Kubernetes namespace 'alerthub' 2. Deploy CloudNative-PG cluster with 1 instance, 1Gi storage 3. Deploy Redis/Valkey using redis-operator with valkey/valkey:7.2-alpine image 4. Create database 'alerthub' with user 'alerthub_user' 5. Generate ConfigMap 'alerthub-infra-config' with DATABASE_URL and REDIS_URL 6. Verify connectivity and create initial schema

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-1): Setup Infrastructure with PostgreSQL and Redis/Valkey

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Test database and Redis connectivity, verify ConfigMap contains valid connection strings, run basic CRUD operations
